text: Sandra Bullock ’ s marriage to boyfriend Bryan Randall is on hold! Spies close to Bullock reveal the Oscar winner has gotten cold feet over getting hitched to her 50 - year - old photographer boyfriend. PHOTOS : DUI Bust, Warrants & Jail — Inside Troubled Past Of Sandra Bullock ’ s New Boyfriend “ All of her friends have been in her ear saying there ’ s no need to rush — especially given all the skeletons in Bryan ’ sccloset, ” dishes a spy close to the couple. Bad - boy Bryan was busted for a DUI in 1998 and served four days in jail. He also trashed a hotel room during a drunken bender.
